1091150.name: Coloring Pixels - Flowers Pack
1091150.description:
Flowers Book

This flower themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by flowers; expect to indulge in vibrant colours, beautiful bouquets, and floral patterns.

Contents

The Flowers book unlocks the following images:
  • Rose - 23x43
  • Blue Rose - 31x38
  • Basket - 44x48
  • Sunflower - 47x48
  • Tulips - 48x42
  • Hummingbird - 48x48
  • Lily - 48x48
  • Vase - 48x48
  • Cactus - 50x62
  • Sunflowers - 54x54
  • Assorted 1 - 59x65
  • Shrub - 64x97
  • Flower - 74x94
  • Vines - 78x100
  • Corsage - 105x105
  • Rose Garden - 120x44
  • Bouquet - 120x113
  • Wreath - 121x118
  • Assorted 2 - 136x98
  • Floral Pattern - 160x68
